title: Upload a CV, cover letter or document
description: Uploads a new CV, cover letter or document.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: SavedDocumentId
fields.description: The unique identifier of the document. Not required when uploading a document.

fields.name: FileName
fields.description: The file name of the document. When uploading a new document, this can be the full path or just the file name, with or without a file extension.

fields.name: UploadDate
fields.description: The date the document was uploaded

returns.description: <MemberSavedDocumentResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: SavedDocumentId
fields.description: The unique identifier of the document.
